title: Genk vs Liverpool prediction: How will Champions League clash play out?
text:
Liverpool continue their defence of the Champions League crown as they meet Genk in Belgium

The Belgian side lost their opening group game heavily to RB Salzburg, but rebounded with a home draw against Napoli.

Liverpool lost to the Italian club before surviving a tough test against the Austrians, prevailing 4-3 in a thrilling fixture.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Jurgen Klopp could have Mohamed Salah available after the Egyptian missed the draw with Manchester United with an ankle problem.

Here is everything you need to know.

Manchester City (-) City started strongly with a 3-0 win over Shakhtar and remain in the top spot Getty Images

Odds

Genk: 19/2

Draw: 5/1

Liverpool: 2/7

Prediction

Genk’s 6-2 defeat to RB Salzburg in their opening games suggests fragility at the back, and though they managed to hold Napoli to a goalless draw, they will struggle to combat Liverpool’s threat. Our prediction is 3-1 to the visitors.

When is it?

Kick-off is at 8pm BST on Wednesday 23rd October.

How can I watch it?

The match will be broadcast on BT Sport 2, with coverage beginning at 7pm.

Subscribers to BT Sport can watch the game online or on mobile via the BT Sport player and BT Sport app.

Team news

Mohamed Salah may be fit enough to feature in the game after missing the Manchester United draw with an ankle issue.

Jurgen Klopp could look to rest players ahead of this weekend’s game with Tottenham, which means there could be opportunities for James Milner and Adam Lallana to start, while Joe Gomez could come in at the back.

Predicted line-up

Liverpool: Alisson; Trent Alexander-Arnold, Joe Gomez, Virgil van Dijk, Andrew Robertson; Fabinho, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain, James Milner; Adam Lallana, Divock Origi, Sadio Mane.

Liverpool lost to the Italian club before surviving a tough test against the Austrians, prevailing 4-3 in a thrilling fixture.
